name: Logo Quiz Festival: Guess the Brands
name_original: Logo Quiz Festival: Guess the Brands
description:
Welcome to Logo Quiz Festival!

Advance through our beloved game by completing the different logos you find on your way. Prove that you know the most about logos!

You are trapped in an unknown place. If you want to go back to your world, you will have to overcome the creatures challenges. Will you be able to solve all the quizzes on the first try?




More than 400 quizzes available to guess in 20 exciting levels.

Exercise your mind with Logo Quiz Festival! The most addictive game ever created that has already conquered millions of people.



- 400 logos.
- 20 different levels!
- Useful tips! 4 clues for each logo! For each correctly guessed logo you will get new clues.
- Different levels of difficulty of the quizzes!
- Continuous updates and expansions of the game - the adventure always goes on!

Don’t miss any of the updates!



Facebook: Cooking and Publishing
Instagram: @cookingandpublishing
Twitter: @letscookgames
